title: T206 Walter Johnson Port PSA Auth Altered
author: ParachromBleu

posts.post_title: T206 Walter Johnson Port PSA Auth Altered
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is this T206 WaJo port with a Sweet Cap 150/649 overprint back, graded PSA Auth Altered. I am unclear what the alteration is supposed to be. Obviously very rounded corners, but a nice image IMO. 

SOLD shipped via tracked USPS Priority. Multiple payment methods accepted.
